original_title: Shorty and the Legend of the Enchanted Reef
overview: After their home reef is destroyed by a fish trawler, Jake and Shorty, two young fish friends, along with Indigo, Shorty’s sister, go on a quest to find a legendary coral reef, one that has never been found by humans. The trio sets out on an adventurous journey, where they will learn about courage, friendship and the ocean’s last underwater haven.
title: Shorty and the Legend of the Enchanted Reef
